messages.subject: Re- replies to digest 172
messages.msgSnippet: Beth, Sandra and all .... I thought you might be interested to know that there are many Waldorf Unschoolers out here in the universe!! I belong to a Waldorf
messages.messageBody:
Beth, Sandra and all ....

I thought you might be interested to know that there are many "Waldorf
Unschoolers" out here in the universe!! I belong to a Waldorf Homeschooling
List and quite a few of us are also very interested in unschooling and do
our best to blend the two together. Rahima Baldwin now offers the Waldor
Homeschooling conferences on the West Coast as well and I had the
opportunity to attend last year- I highly recommend it- no matter what kind
of homeschooling you are using they have wonderful ideas to share.

If you'd like more info on the Waldorf Homeschooling List, I'd be happy to
pass it on.

Lyn Turner
